content: I'm on a lean version that's only a couple weeks old... I'm getting a syntax error on match _: e with, but not on if _: e then... is this normal?
it depends on what you mean by normal
it is expected given how those things are defined
I've been trying to use binderIdent consistently in tactics for binder declarations, but it is still quite incomplete and if you use ident instead in the tactic declaration then _ will be rejected
_x is fine indeed, I was just surprised by the discrepancy... nothing worth worrying about... thanks!
